title: Total livestock and animal products in Canada 2016
summary: The Total of livestock , animal products and Canada fluctuates in Canada during the year 2016 .
From Januar until June it is remaining almost stable .
From June until October it rises continuously and reaches the maximum value in October .
gold: The accompanying shows the monthly development of total livestock and animal products production in the year 2016 in Canada , measured in FPPI . It starts out at 1450 in January , increases slightly to just shy of 1475 in March , falls to 1430 in April and increases again to 1460 in June . After that it constantly decreases until reaching its lowest point of 1260 in October .
